name: The Six-Sided Rogue-Roller
description:
The Six-Sided Rogue-Roller

The mighty D20's have fallen. The clever D12's stood no chance. Not even the little D4's were spared from the rage of Those Who Command the Cursors. And yet you are still here. A lonely and independent D6. A commoner in the eyes of many.

You don't really care about the EVIL USERS and their weird fantasy mental games.

You only care about one thing: to keep rolling.

The mission is simple: Roll around aiming for the highest score that you can. Use your MIGHTY ROLL to defeat the EVIL USERS that want to catch you to start their little roleplaying game. 

But hey! Each time you roll a different number is chosen, so pay attention and grab the Random Cards at the proper moment to get different effects depending on your current dice number.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • U to roll.

GMTKJam 2022 Entry. Game developed by Zudest (https://zudest.itch.io/). Art based on the 1-bit Pack from Kenney (kenney.nl). Music by Eric Matyas (soundimage.org)

This was my very first game in a really long time (and as a note i used the Jam as an excuse to learn Godot haha). Sadly I wasn't able to do everything that i wanted to do (and i had to change directions a few times) but my main goal with this was to actually finish a game so im really happy with that.
